origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'GovernmentPortal.get_policy_update', 'description': 'Get the latest government policy updates on a specific topic', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the topic of the policy update'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policy_update', 'description': 'the latest policy update on the specified topic'}]}, {'name': 'TaxOffice.get_local_education_surcharge_rate', 'description': 'Get the local education surcharge rate for a specific region', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the region to query for the education surcharge rate'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'surcharge_rate', 'description': 'the education surcharge rate for the specified region'}]}, {'name': 'ElectronicTaxBureau.submit_surcharge_declaration', 'description': 'Submit the education surcharge declaration through the electronic tax bureau', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'declaration_data', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the data required for the surcharge declaration'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'submission_status', 'description': 'the status of the surcharge declaration submission'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解中国地方教育附加的最新政策。首先，获取最新的关于地方教育附加改革的政府公告。然后，分析这些政策对地方教育投入的影响。接着，查询我所在地区的地方教育附加率。最后，了解如何通过电子税务局进行地方教育附加的申报。
获取最新的关于地方教育附加改革的政府公告

education_surcharge_reform
